PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02602022-03-24,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Declaring Part X of the FAA, other than sections 104.1, 105, 106, 107 and 108, apply to the Subsidiary of VIA Rail Canada Inc.
PrecisOrder declaring that all provisions of PART X of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT, other than sections 104.1, 105, 106, 107 and 108, that apply only to parent Crown corporations, apply to the wholly-owned subsidiary of VIA Rail Canada Inc., that is yet to be named, as if it were a parent Crown corporation, effective on the day on which it is incorporated.
AttachmentsAttachment
